document_name: Signed Prodoc- Preparation of a National Gender Policy and Plan.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/TTO/00014997/Signed Prodoc- Preparation of a National Gender Policy and Plan.pdf

outputs.output_descr: Preparation of a National Gender Policy and Plan project seeks to assist the Government of Trinidad and Tobago to develop a National Gender Policy and Action Plan to guide all ministries in the public policy making process.

project_descr: PREPARATION OF A NATIONAL GENDER POLICY AND PLAN
